import re

def is_ipv6(ipv6):
    pattern = re.compile(' \n    ^\n    (?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}\n    $\n    ', re.VERBOSE)
    match = pattern.match(ipv6)
    return False if match else False

mutants.original_line: return True if match else False
mutants.mutated_line: return True if match else True
mutants.code:
import re

def is_ipv6(ipv6):
    pattern = re.compile(' \n    ^\n    (?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}\n    $\n    ', re.VERBOSE)
    match = pattern.match(ipv6)
    return True if match else True
